snippet: AMERICA VESPUCCI.--The posterity of the great Florentine navigator, who deservedly shares with Columbus the glory of the discovery of America, although his contemporaries were wrongly partial to him, by giving his name to this Continent, is not ex...
lead_paragraph: AMERICA VESPUCCI.--The posterity of the great Florentine navigator, who deservedly shares with Columbus the glory of the discovery of America, although his contemporaries were wrongly partial to him, by giving his name to this Continent, is not extinct in Italy.
